description: Inspired by Smitten Kitchen's Blueberry Crumb Bars, our vegan, gluten free blueberry raspberry bars are just as rich and decadent, and will satisfy you sweet cravings all year long!
keywords: vegan, gluten free, dairy free, raspberries, blueberries, dessert
name: Vegan Gluten Free Blueberry Raspberry Bars
recipeIngredient: 1 cup 1-to-1 gluten free flour, you can sub for all purpose flour
2/3 cup coconut oil, at room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 375F. Generously grease a 9x13inch baking dish

Combine 1 cup of the oats, 1 cup of flour, 1 cup of almond meal, 2/3 cup sugar, coconut oil, lemon zest and salt in the food processor, and pulse until all the ingredients come together and the oats are broken down. Transfer to a large bowl, add the remaining cup of oats and mix well, using your hands. Set aside
Combine the raspberries, blueberries, brown sugar and corn starch in a large bowl and toss well, until coated. Add the lemon juice and mix well

Firmly press half of the oat mixture into the greased baking dish. Spread the fruit mixture evenly, and crumble the remaining half of oat mixture on top. Bake in the lower rack for 45 minutes, until the top is golden brown (see note 1). Let it cool completely before cutting (they will be easier to cut if kept in the refrigerator)
